tool_description: Get the basic specifications on all types of commercial airplanes.

title: AirplanesDB

api_list.description: Get all airplanes ordered by name in descending order.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://airplanesdb.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "airplanesdb.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://airplanesdb.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "airplanesdb.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
